headline: SCHAEFER ROTARY LAMINATING PRESS 18"
specstable:
Manufacturer Schaefer Machine Co.
Model Smoothing Press Size 18
Description Rotary Laminating Press 18" Width
Other Information
  • 3 ¼” diameter rolls covered with non-tacky urethane rubber
  • Variable speed drive with top speed of 60 ft per minute.
  • Adjustment for initial opening between rolls
  • Cam mechanism used to separate rolls when not in use to prevent flat – spotting.
  • Guard plate in front of nip point will cause rolls to stop if it is depressed or if anything thicker than parts being laminated approaches the nip point.
  • Standard roll opening is adjustable up to 1 ½”.
  • Both rolls are driven.
Exterior Dimensions
Width 44.000 in (111.8 cm)
Depth 22.000 in (55.9 cm)
Height 48.000 in (121.9 cm)
Weight 234 lb (106 kg)
